main event: Two sergeants observed an unusually bright light in the sky, which changed colors and appeared to be larger than a star.
interesting points: The object was approximately 3-4 times the size of a star., The light changed colors to blue, green, and red., The object appeared and disappeared periodically., The sighting lasted for about 30 minutes., The event was reported by Sergeant Frank Boll and Sergeant Vincent Coppola.
sighted object: an unusually bright light in the sky
witness description: Sergeant Frank Boll and Sergeant Vincent Coppola
